metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9964 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: redirect() in bottle.py in bottle 0.12.10 doesn't filter a "\r\n" sequence, which leads to a CRLF attack, as demonstrated by a redirect("233\r\nSet-Cookie: name=salt") call. It was discovered that Bottle improperly handles headers. An attacker could possibly exploit this as a CRLF attack.

criterions.comment: python-bottle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
